name: places/ChIJLSzEOLNZwokRaLz-Kww9XNU
formattedAddress: 129 Delancey St, New York, NY 10002, USA
adrFormatAddress: 129 Delancey St, New York, NY 10002, USA

editorialSummary.text: Theater complex with multiple screens featuring new release films, plush seating & concession stand.

originalText.text:
I signed up for regal unlimited and starting coming here. The last movie I ever seen in theaters was flubber but that was around 1997 and when I was a kid in school.  I love this location. Staff is friendly and kind and the place is big. At the beginning I was scared to go to the movies and I remember asking people to go with me but everyone made excuses. I have really bad social anxiety and PTSD and I was scared that being around a group of people would trigger my PTSD. I kept pulling off going to the movies because everyone was basically either too busy or made excuses so I decide to take that risk and go by myself and that was the best decision I ever made.

The first movie I saw was little mermaid. When I was in that theater I was feeling proud of myself. I felt this sense of freedom and confidence. I felt happy being there on my own. I‚Äôm an introvert so most introvert would understand that feeling. I started to feel happier being on my own. this changed me because I went to the movies again that same day but at night to see flash. Then I went back the following day and the day after. I was no longer afraid and felt true freedom. the crazy story is that I was supposed to go to the movies yesterday with my neighbor but I ditched her and went by myself. I remember being afraid of going alone and now I feel like I don‚Äôt need anyone and I‚Äôm fine being by myself. I do feel disappointed that it took this long for me to take those steps. I wish I could have done this years ago because I missed out on so many great movies that was in theaters

originalText.text:
Everytime I watch movie there it is always a memory to remember because most of the staffs are friendly. They also have a discount promo if you subscribe to them. And, also the place is clean especially the bathrooms(it just gets dirty because of those nasty people who are using it).
I will definitely recommend this cinema for a movie viewing. üëè

originalText.text: I really like this cinema! It is clean for the most part; the theatres are not overcrowded - in my experience. The staff is helpful and management looks to be making an effort. There is a small bar/lounge area on both floors to wait for someone running late or chat about the movie with friends afterwards OR sit and sip solo!

text.text: I really like this cinema! It is clean for the most part; the theatres are not overcrowded - in my experience. The staff is helpful and management looks to be making an effort. There is a small bar/lounge area on both floors to wait for someone running late or chat about the movie with friends afterwards OR sit and sip solo!

originalText.text: Plenty of friendly and attentive staff. The staff at the concession stand helped me use my points and explained the choices that had the most value. Theatre and bathrooms were clean. Seats were comfortable and sound and lighting were perfect.
